import React from "react"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; import { faPalette, faPaperPlane } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { faFacebookF, faInstagram, faPinterest, faEtsy } from "@fortawesome/free-brands-svg-icons"; const Footer = () => { return (

Resin Art Creations

Creating unique, handcrafted resin art pieces that bring beauty to everyday life.

Shop

  • All Products
  • New Arrivals
  • Best Sellers
  • Gift Cards

Information

  • About Us
  • Shipping Policy
  • Return Policy
  • FAQ

Newsletter

Subscribe to get updates on new products and special offers!

© {new Date().getFullYear()} Resin Art Creations. All rights reserved.

); }; export default Footer;
